title: Anouk Khaki Kurta
body:
Khaki woven kurta, has a round neck, a short button placket, long sleeves with roll-up button tabs, a curved and high-low hem with side slits
The model (height 5'8", chest 33" and waist 28") is wearing a size S
100% rayon Machine-wash
Don this exquisitely crafted ethnic marvel to create a lasting impression and more. Team it with a pair of leggings and flats to complete the ensemble.
